For the team of each driver, we find specialists from the EPAM HR PL team who help to process the request faster and more efficiently. Now, there are certain conditions for becoming a driver: seniority level A2. There are no restrictions on experience and level for those who support operational  processing – the only condition is willingness to help in solving problems.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":53942,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6a455756-592a-45b8-b915-37174e51249d/ookknn.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6a455756-592a-45b8-b915-37174e51249d/ookknn.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"ookknn.PNG\",\"name\":\"ookknn.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6a455756-592a-45b8-b915-37174e51249d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":250,\"height\":382},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Additional But we address such requests to the relevant services and give feedback to the customer.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We don't make and organize events by request.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We don't take long-term operational tasks.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
